SELECT PROD.* FROM ( SELECT PR.* FROM ( SELECT PR.PROD_L_NUM ,PR.PROD_L_CODE ,PR.PROD_L_OPTION1 ,PR.PROD_L_OPTION2 ,PR.PROD_L_OPTION3 ,PR.PROD_L_OPTION4 ,PR.PROD_L_OPTION5 ,(SELECT CC.CD_OPT_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CC.CD_OPT = PR.PROD_L_OPTION1) AS nm1 ,(SELECT CC.CD_OPT_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CC.CD_OPT = PR.PROD_L_OPTION2) AS nm2 ,(SELECT CC.CD_OPT_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CC.CD_OPT = PR.PROD_L_OPTION3) AS nm3 ,(SELECT CC.CD_OPT_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CC.CD_OPT = PR.PROD_L_OPTION4) AS nm4 ,(SELECT CC.CD_OPT_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CC.CD_OPT = PR.PROD_L_OPTION5) AS nm5 ,PR.PROD_L_PRODNM ,PR.PROD_L_PRICE ,PR.PROD_L_UPLOADDATE ,PR.PROD_L_COMPNM ,PR.PROD_L_MAINIMG ,PR.PROD_L_SUBIMG ,PR.PROD_L_DETAIL ,PR.PROD_L_QUANTITY ,PL.avgRating FROM projectdb.PRODUCT_LIST PR LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PROD_L_NUM,ROUND(AVG(RATING)) AS avgRating FROM projectdb.PRODUCT_REPLY GROUP BY PROD_L_NUM) PL ON PR.PROD_L_NUM = PL.PROD_L_NUM ) PR WHERE 1=1
AND ( REGEXP_LIKE (PR.nm1 , #{srhText}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PR.nm2 , #{srhText}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PR.nm3 , #{srhText}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PR.nm4 , #{srhText}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PR.nm5 , #{srhText}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PR.PROD_L_PRODNM , #{srhText}) )
AND ( REGEXP_LIKE (PROD_L_OPTION2 , #{category}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PROD_L_OPTION3 , #{category}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PROD_L_OPTION4 , #{category}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PROD_L_OPTION5 , #{category}) )
ORDER BY
PR.PROD_L_NUM DESC
PR.PROD_L_PRICE DESC
PR.PROD_L_PRICE ASC
PR.PROD_L_NUM DESC
) PROD LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(PROD.PROD_L_NUM) FROM ( SELECT PR.PROD_L_NUM ,PR.PROD_L_CODE ,PR.PROD_L_OPTION1 ,PR.PROD_L_OPTION2 ,PR.PROD_L_OPTION3 ,PR.PROD_L_OPTION4 ,PR.PROD_L_OPTION5 ,(SELECT CC.CD_OPT_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CC.CD_OPT = PR.PROD_L_OPTION1) AS nm1 ,(SELECT CC.CD_OPT_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CC.CD_OPT = PR.PROD_L_OPTION2) AS nm2 ,(SELECT CC.CD_OPT_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CC.CD_OPT = PR.PROD_L_OPTION3) AS nm3 ,(SELECT CC.CD_OPT_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CC.CD_OPT = PR.PROD_L_OPTION4) AS nm4 ,(SELECT CC.CD_OPT_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CC.CD_OPT = PR.PROD_L_OPTION5) AS nm5 ,PR.PROD_L_PRODNM ,PR.PROD_L_PRICE ,PR.PROD_L_UPLOADDATE ,PR.PROD_L_COMPNM ,PR.PROD_L_MAINIMG ,PR.PROD_L_SUBIMG ,PR.PROD_L_DETAIL ,PR.PROD_L_QUANTITY FROM projectdb.PRODUCT_LIST PR ) PROD WHERE 1=1
AND ( REGEXP_LIKE (PROD.nm1 , #{srhText}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PROD.nm2 , #{srhText}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PROD.nm3 , #{srhText}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PROD.nm4 , #{srhText}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PROD.nm5 , #{srhText}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PROD.PROD_L_PRODNM , #{srhText}) )
AND ( REGEXP_LIKE (PROD_L_OPTION2 , #{category}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PROD_L_OPTION3 , #{category}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PROD_L_OPTION4 , #{category}) OR REGEXP_LIKE (PROD_L_OPTION5 , #{category}) )

SELECT PROD_L_NUM ,PROD_L_CODE ,PROD_L_OPTION1 ,PROD_L_OPTION2 ,PROD_L_OPTION3 ,PROD_L_OPTION4 ,PROD_L_OPTION5 ,PROD_L_PRODNM ,PROD_L_PRICE ,PROD_L_UPLOADDATE ,PROD_L_COMPNM ,PROD_L_MAINIMG ,PROD_L_SUBIMG ,PROD_L_DETAIL ,PROD_L_QUANTITY FROM projectdb.PRODUCT_LIST WHERE PROD_L_NUM = #{prodLNum}

SELECT R.REPLY_NUM ,L.PROD_L_NUM ,U.USER_ID ,R.CONTENT ,R.RATING ,R.REPLY_DATE ,(SELECT round(AVG(B.RATING)) AS AV FROM PRODUCT_REPLY B WHERE B.PROD_L_NUM = L.PROD_L_NUM) AS avgRating ,(SELECT COUNT(B.PROD_L_NUM) FROM PRODUCT_REPLY B WHERE B.PROD_L_NUM = L.PROD_L_NUM) AS countRating FROM PRODUCT_REPLY R LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_LIST L ON R.PROD_L_NUM = L.PROD_L_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_INFO U ON R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND L.PROD_L_NUM = #{prodLNum} ORDER BY R.REPLY_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_REPLY(PROD_L_NUM, USER_ID, CONTENT, RATING) VALUES (#{prodLNum}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{rating})
mapper.select: SELECT PL.PROD_L_NUM ,PL.PROD_L_CODE ,PL.PROD_L_OPTION1 ,PL.PROD_L_OPTION2 ,PL.PROD_L_OPTION3 ,PL.PROD_L_OPTION4 ,PL.PROD_L_OPTION5 ,PL.PROD_L_PRODNM ,PL.PROD_L_PRICE ,PL.PROD_L_UPLOADDATE ,PL.PROD_L_COMPNM ,PL.PROD_L_MAINIMG ,PL.PROD_L_SUBIMG ,PL.PROD_L_DETAIL ,PL.PROD_L_QUANTITY ,PR.avgRating FROM projectdb.PRODUCT_LIST PL LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PROD_L_NUM,ROUND(AVG(RATING)) AS avgRating FROM projectdb.PRODUCT_REPLY GROUP BY PROD_L_NUM) PR ON PR.PROD_L_NUM = PL.PROD_L_NUM ORDER BY PL.PROD_L_CODE DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT PL.PROD_L_NUM ,PL.PROD_L_CODE ,PL.PROD_L_OPTION1 ,PL.PROD_L_OPTION2 ,PL.PROD_L_OPTION3 ,PL.PROD_L_OPTION4 ,PL.PROD_L_OPTION5 ,PL.PROD_L_PRODNM ,PL.PROD_L_PRICE ,PL.PROD_L_UPLOADDATE ,PL.PROD_L_COMPNM ,PL.PROD_L_MAINIMG ,PL.PROD_L_SUBIMG ,PL.PROD_L_DETAIL ,PL.PROD_L_QUANTITY ,PR.avgRating FROM projectdb.PRODUCT_LIST PL INNER JOIN( SELECT A.ORD_L_CODE,A.ORD_L_QUANTITY FROM ( SELECT ORD_L_CODE, SUM(ORD_L_QUANTITY) AS ORD_L_QUANTITY FROM projectdb.ORDER_LIST GROUP BY ORD_L_CODE) A ORDER BY ORD_L_QUANTITY DESC LIMIT 4 ) QU ON PL.PROD_L_CODE = QU.ORD_L_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PROD_L_NUM,ROUND(AVG(RATING)) AS avgRating FROM projectdb.PRODUCT_REPLY GROUP BY PROD_L_NUM) PR ON PR.PROD_L_NUM = PL.PROD_L_NUM
